Title: Restricts the performance of surgical devocalization procedures on dogs and cats
Summary: Restricts the performance of surgical devocalization procedures on dogs and cats; prohibited for reasons of convenience in keeping or handling a dog or cat.
LawCode: Add ยง365-a, amd ยง374, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to restricting the performance of surgical devocalization procedures on dogs and cats
